ygData.subject: Re: Banks
ygData.msgSnippet: Two people from separate accounts, otherwise Twinkies would be REAL easy to start. Otherwise, I like the idea. You could have Guild accounts as well, which
ygData.messageBody:
Two people from separate accounts, otherwise Twinkies would be REAL easy to
start. Otherwise, I like the idea. You could have Guild accounts as well,
which would be super cool. Let the officers in the guild get into the bank
account. Maybe even make it bigger than normal.

-Zantaer, Fennin Ro, Sterling Order of Knights

-----Original Message-----
From: JivingPoo [mailto:jivingpoo@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 5:43 PM
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Banks


From: "JivingPoo" <jivingpoo@...>

Sounds like a great idea!

Kiamone, Bard of Freeport
Fennin Ro



> Anyone else here think that they should make joint bank accounts? Have a
> limit on the number of people that can go into it. This would be great for
> people into trade skills. 2 friends smithing together, put all profit into
> the account. Have it completely seperate from the original ones. And have
all
> players consent to it, so that Verant can't do anything about stolen
money.
> Just say sorry. I think this would be very cool. What other people think?
>
> Kondor, Half Elf Paladin
> ~Veeshan~
>
